summary: An remodel of Radiant Raiment shops,as well as extension of selling offer
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]This mod changes the store Radiant Raiment in two ways.

First is Architectural Interrior.
The store is now little bit advanced,and it has two purposes.
First it sells expensive clothes and second is jewelry selling.
The jewelry is displayed and unique clutter is also introduced.

Second change is that of sell list.
On sell list are now unique woman dressess,tops and jewelry pcs which thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64313/]NewMiller[/url] are available.
Also Bal Gowns which are available thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25873/]Zzjay[/url]
And Noble Dresses which are here thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54793]Nimezis[/url]
There are four pair of woman shoes as well as one new dress which are available thx to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14642]Neovinci[/url]
Also unique rings and amulets which were designed by  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361]Lautestenni[/url]

In the end,you can also buy Nocturnal Dress,and some of Jarl's outfits and also new women gloves and couple of more shoes.

I highly recomment the mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87945/]Destructible Display Cases[/url],for those who are in a mod for thievery.

Plus an unique Music to immerse yours shopping experience (music is custom made by an friend of mine).

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][u]Version 1.2[/u] has three more dresses from Oriental set,but if your charachter is an male,
then you will recieve men suit from Romantic Outfit mod by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5577]SydneyB[/url]﻿.[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][u]Version 1.3[/u] has five outfits from Nobles Oblige clothes created  by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63634]Jacknifelee[/url]﻿.
[/size][/font]
[size=3][b]Crediteria :
